title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-05] [$250] iOS - Expense - Chat header appears after delay when opening expense report
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Launch New Expensify app
2. Submit two expenses to a user with no chat history
3. In 1:1 DM, tap on the expense preview

Expected result: Expense report header will appear instantly

Actual result: None
